item.title: How to Write an Ansible Module Unit Test in the Ansible Collection Paradigm
item.description: This tutorial will cover two major issues. One - how to setup your local workstation to build and test an ansible collection, and two - resolving a mac error related to cgroups. We will finish with a helloworld unit test to validate.
